OOC: No, afraid not, Pokemon had 2 problems: Merchandise and cartoon, carto=
on being worse. Oh, and Hey You Pikachu was pretty bad. As for American God=
zilla, it just sucked no matter which way you put it...


  ----- Original =
Message ----- 
  From: Kyle Stewart 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: =
Sunday, December 02, 2001 5:56 PM
  Subject: Re: OOC


  By the way Pokemon=
 was not stupid. It had the same
  problem as that American "Godzilla" movi=
e. It got to
  popular to fast and it burnt out early. Gradually
  gaining =
popularity is why FF and Megaman are still
  around.

  --- RoboRick007 <rf=
a007@...> wrote:
  > OOC: Man, I held out with SEGA, and what did I ge=
t?
  > I got stuck with the
  > sucky Saturn system. My gut tells me that N=
intendo
  > is dead. GameCube is
  > their last hurra. I plan on getting X-=
Box when the
  > price comes down a
  > bit. And X-Box is coming out with t=
he sweet looking
  > 'WWF Raw Is War'.
  > Anyway I just wanted to add my 2=
 cents!
  > 
  > And yes the PS/PS2 WWF Smackdown series sucks!
